title: 【PT】 International group praises green revival
summary: 【PT】 A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

title: 【PT】 Fuselage Flaws Found on 14 of Russia’s Superjet Airliners
summary: 【PT】 According to Izvestia, structural elements known as stringers, which reinforce the fuselage, were not properly secured in the section between the cockpit and the passenger door.

title: 【PT】 From War Surge to Slump: Is the Russian Economy Heading Toward Recession?
summary: 【PT】 The Russian economy is still posting GDP growth, but the war-driven boost from heavy budget spending is fading.

title: 【PT】 Scroll-Shaped Skyscraper Design Wins Vote to Replace Iconic Novy Arbat Building in Moscow
summary: 【PT】 The skyscraper will replace the Soviet-era Council for Mutual Economic Assistance building, which was deemed structurally unsound in October.

title: 【PT】 Salario mínimo en Angola pasará a 100 mil kwanzas

title: 【PT】 Egipto considera las políticas israelíes como un peligro regional

title: 【PT】 Hospital de Puerto Rico recurre a la quiebra agobiado por deudas
summary: 【PT】 San Juan, 26 ago (Prensa Latina) Agobiado por deudas ascendentes a 39,7 millones de dólares, el Hospital El Maestro de Puerto Rico se acogió al capítulo 11 de la Ley de Quiebras de Estados Unidos, se conoció hoy. The post Hospital de Puerto Rico recurre a la q

title: 【PT】 Peacock Chosen as Symbol of 12th National Games
summary: 【PT】 (KPL) The Organizing Committee of the 12th National Games has officially adopted the design, logo, mascot, and motto for the upcoming “Vientiane Games 2025.” The committee announced that the lucky animal, the peacock, will serve as the symbol of the event.
